summary: This bill, the Quantum Leadership in Emerging Applications and Policy Act of 2025, establishes the Commission on American Quantum Information Science and Technology Dominance. The commission, composed of 12 appointed members, will examine and make recommendations on advancing and securing the development of quantum information science and related technologies by the U.S. government and private sector.  The commission will conduct a review, coordinate with federal agencies, and produce interim and final reports. It focuses on national and economic security implications, workforce development, and international competitiveness in quantum technology and its applications.
